Object.Description: I was a fool before, but now everything is so clear. This item is a rare version of Staff of the Fundamental Core. This stuff give +10% additional bonus on all original equipment damage and +1% fame bonus.

This skull glows with stolen lifeforce of ancient devils. This item is a rare version of Skull of the Undead King. This stuff give +10% additional bonus on all original equipment damage, +50% additional bonus on all original equipment stats and +1% fame bonus.

An ancient robe weaved with fire garnets of the Fire God. This item is a rare version of Robe of the Ancient Intellect. This stuff give +50% additional bonus on all original equipment stats and +1% fame bonus.

Object.id: Flaming Crown of the Fire God
Object.Description: A pure flaming crown dropped from the Fire God himself. This item is a rare version of Amulet of Resurrection. This stuff give +50% additional bonus on all original equipment stats.

A pure shattered crown dropped from The Forgotten King himself. This item is a rare version of The Forgotten Crown. This stuff give +50% additional bonus on all original equipment stats and +1% fame bonus.
An odd stone, eminating a dark and mysterious energy. This item is a rare version of The Twilight Gemstone. This stuff give +50% additional bonus on all original equipment stats and +1% fame bonus.
Wearing it makes you feel particularly strong. This item is a rare version of Bracer of the Guardian. This stuff give +50% additional bonus on all original equipment stats and +1% fame bonus.
A ring crafted from the dangerous Fire Coral.
A ring crafted from the dangerous Fire Coral. This item is a rare version of Coral Ring. This stuff give +50% additional bonus on all original equipment stats and +1% fame bonus.
A potion that permanently maxes attack power.
A potion that permanently maxes defense power.
A potion that permanently maxes speed.
A potion that permanently maxes vitality.
A potion that permanently maxes wisdom.
A potion that permanently maxes dexterity.
A potion that permanently maxes health.
A potion that permanently maxes magic.
The server downloaded this item from the internet. It opens a portal that downloads a dungeon from the internet.
America!
America!
America!
For noobish.
One of a kind staff for the server Developers
A crossbow built from the ground that Oryx walked on.

A quiver that uses the power of an earthen beast's poison. It's strong powers alow it to harness powers from many other quivers. Though the powers of this great quiver have been harnessed by few it is still very well known.
An armor forged from a tortoise's skin. It is slightly weaker than other armors, but it's enchantment from Oryx provides a speed boost to the user.
An amulet of ressurection that was blessed by Mother Nature herself.
A legendary tome designed by grand priests to damage their foes.
Pixies are often a more aggressive fae. It makes great sense that they would provide heroes with swords as fine as this.
Reinforced with magical hard candy from the candy forest. Sticky but strong.
A worn and battered suit of armor embedded with a mystic gem that flows with magical strength.
A high-fructose ring that'll give you pep, but hurt your concentration.
A staff that glows with the warmth and color of the rising sun.
A spell that blasts enemies with the fiery force of a thousand suns.
A ceremonial robe worn by ritual leaders during the celebration of the Summer Solstice. Its golden threads shine with the light of the sun.
A ring forged by the mad god in the flames of the suns surface. Its magic protects its owner from some harm.

Object.id: Infected Staff of the Cosmic Whole
Object.Description: An infected staff of transcendent understanding, made from crystals present at the formation of universe.
A great infected sword of recognition, forged by the gods for the champions of humankind.
An infected diamondwire bow used by guardians of the unseen ethereal shrines.
A crimson infected felsteel dagger saturated with evil magic and primordial hatreds.
Made of a strange metal not known to the living.
On simple observation this robe has known many owners. All are dead.
Woven from the skin of a ghast, it cannot be seen... except by the user.
Magical blasts can be blocked by armor, but true fear will pierce their hides and strike their heart.
Though the whispers can be heard in your head, they're not THAT loud.
An unsettling glow looms beneath the ancient gem's surface. Soon enough its power will be unleashed again.
While it may be alive, it can't speak. But, it CAN kill.
It was Boshy Time.
A magnificent legendary infected blade which only cuts those who deserve death.
This infected spear gained it's godly power when it was lunged through the heart of a powerfull deity
An infected great golden wand of the heavens, created by angels to wreak justice on the slayers of the innocent.
A prismatic rod of divine understanding, made from prismatic crystals present at the formation of cosmos.
An amazing prismatic sword of forgotten ages, forged by the prismatic crystals for the champions.
A prismatic wire crossbow used by titans of the cosmos.
A crimson prismatic machete saturated with evil magic and primordial hatreds.
A magnificent prismatic katana which only cuts those who deserve death.
It can penetrate in any armor, nothing can stop it.
A prismatic wand of the crystals, created by titans to wreak justice on the slayers of the innocent.
Reinforced with magical hard crystal from the cosmos.
Created for the sole purpose of power and purification.
Seems legit prismatic crystal into this armor.
An amulet that protects the soul of users against evils.
When consumed, gives permanently VIP access!
A detailed hand-axe crafted out of blackened metal and precious bloodstone by Enraged Oryx's minions as a tribute to their overlord.

Object.id: Blessed Onyx Shield of the Mad God
Object.Description: A pitch-black blessed shield looted from the depths of Wine Cellar.
A piece of heavyarmor plate mail forged in the Wine Cellar of Oryx, it is decorated with dark red Almandine stones.
Set with stones as red as Oryx's favorite Cabernet Sauvignon.
A detailed sword crafted out of blackened metal and precious bloodstone by Oryx's minions as a tribute to their overlord.

Object.id: Onyx Shield of the Mad God
Object.Description: A pitch-black shield looted from the depths of Oryx's Castle.
A piece of heavy plate mail forged in the dungeons of Oryx's castle, it is decorated with dark red Almandine stones.
Set with stones as red as Oryx's favorite Cabernet Sauvignon.

When consumed, gives 145 gold.
Used only by the pirates who would make themselves kings, this cutlass is said to be cursed as each Pirate King seems to be killed rather unexpectedly.
Stuck in the maw of the Son of Arachna, this Katana is coated in the creature's poisonous venom. In the hands of the right person, this is a truly deadly weapon.
A sword that, when held by one true of heart, will release magic from the flawless ruby in its hilt and ignite in flames.
You are a unique snowflake. You're like one type.
So hot, it's cool. The unique combo of hot and cold elements allows it to generate devastating ice attacks.
This colorful platemail is enchanted with special protections, a gift from the kind fairies that dwell in the Realm.
Protect the helpless, embolden the heroic, slow the progress of evil. - Inscription, in Fae.
Evils can't keep it anymore... Only brave paladin can hold this and affront the Overlord.
Many do not realize how powerful a kind wish is.
A bow of light forged by the angels for use in their eternal struggle against darkness and evil.
... finally, I cornered and killed the beast. When I awoke in a cold sweat... I felt youthful, powerful.
A ceremonial garment worn by those who worship the god Geb.
Despite their normal pacificity, priests of Geb were able to protect themselves from aggressors.
He does not kill his victims. He becomes them.
Within, the priests of the past have catalogued the story and knowledge of Geb.
It is said that the ring attunes it's wearer to the earth and it's life force.
I was a fool before, but now everything is so clear. The phylactery speaks to me, knows me, protects me.
All shall know my power. Not even the Mad God can stop me.
As I lifted the stone from its resting place it became readily apparent there was more to it then met the eye...
Crude, but effective.
The metal is icy cold to the touche and delivers a biting sting upon cutting.
How else would the minions of Oryx get their gifts?
Fa la la la la, la la la la.
A swift and hungry blade that is never satisfied with just one kill.
No mortal can fire this dreaded bow without resting in between shots. It requires tremendous skill to wield.
Once the most powerful staff in existence, a crack in its frame has rendered it incapable of focusing fire. It remains uniquely deadly.
A sound almost like a wind chime emanates softly from this wand.
This helm was forged of metal that fell from the sky. It is strangely light and emits a faint hum.
Why not a helmet of the Mad God?
A bow fashioned from living coral found in only the deepest ocean trenches. It is the favored weapon of those that inhabit the realms beneath of waves.
A tome dedicated to the works of a forgotten god is written in a strange script that glows with a pure white light.
This legendary dagger was commissioned by a band of mad rogues to prove the worth of the Dirk.
This orb of ancient bloodstone has a dark reputation of twisting those who wield it.
This massive shield was created for the wealthy and powerful Ogre kings as a sign of their unrivaled strength.
A lightweight blade that seems to dance in your hands.
A slow but powerful sword that is a relic of a long forgotten age.
A seal that is said to briefly borrow the power of the Gods themselves. Some Paladins shun its dark power, others embrace it.
This strange quiver that was created in a forgotten age by a lost tribe of Dark Elves.
An ancient tome bound in white Leather, created to aid in the struggle against the ultimate evil.
A trap imbued with deadly venom from the coral of the Ocean Trench
Mermaid-maide armor woven from unbreakable coral threads.
This strange weapon was used by ancient battle mages to deter invaders. The secret to its construction has long been lost.
This orb increase +20 in all of your stats (ATT/DEF/DEX/SPD/VIT/WIS).
This mushroom max you 4/8 (DEX/SPD/VIT/WIS).
This orb increase +5 in all of your stats (ATT/DEF/DEX/SPD/VIT/WIS).

A potion that permanently increases defense power.
A potion that permanently increases speed.
A potion that permanently increases vitality.

A potion that permanently increases dexterity.
A potion that permanently increases health.
A potion that permanently increases magic.
A terribly dangerous sword that can slice through anything in existence.
A helmet that was used by the captain of the Undead Hobbit Army in the great battle of the Ents and the Mages.
An annihilation armor stripped of some of its parts, rendering it less heavy. The great General Joshyswag was known to have led the Ent army into battles with this armor on.
An amulet of resurrection cursed with a plaque from being worn by so many undead soldiers.
Long-forgotten collector's item
A powerful scepter used by the god Zeus to frighten his foes.
A terrifyingly sharp dagger with a blade able to slice past flesh and bone.
A terrible venom created from the deadly extracts of the Tomb.
An ancient wand made of enchanted platinum.
An ancient sword made of enchanted platinum.
A key that opens a portal to Zombies mode.
A dangerous orb whose very existence is unstable, many have sought after its power to move through legions unscathed.
A very confusing prism that leaves foes deciding between 3 of the same target.
A fatal sword enchanted with the black magic of the dark mages designed to make the world do its bidding.

Object.Description: Pro fucking spriteing made by Pontus "Donran" Norrstr'o'm. He's the fucking legend when it comes to spriteing.
An amulet that increases your forging knowledge, making research and materials much cheaper. Breaks after use.
This Wand holds such great power. It corrupts even the purest who wield it.
A wand shaped by the darkest forces of Oryx kingdom.
This pearl contains the purest of life and the darkest of evil, when used, this is unleashed in a massive blast.
The most coveted and valuable robe found in all the kingdom of Oryx, only the bravest may have the merit of using it.

There are no words to define the power and hauntings that are around this ring. Even the great kings fell into the temptation to get it, but without success. This item is a rare version of Ring of Unbound Health. This stuff give +50% additional bonus on all original equipment stats and +1% fame bonus.
Only the fury of the great juggernauts can stop the power of this magnificent sword.
For several decades, incredible hardness and quality materials were hidden in Oryx kingdom, now that the juggernauts dominated this technique will no armor as impenetrable as this.
Hundreds of grand sphinxes and hermits god were annihilated for the most amount of materials capable of forging a helm of the juggernaut, but dark forces have achieved more than this simple fact.
This is your reward for the second place of Tournament Arena 2nd edition. This tarot active 2 seconds of beserker effect in 12 sqrs area.
This is your reward for the first place of Tournament Arena 2nd edition. This tarot active 2 seconds of invulnerable effect on yourself.
This is your reward for the third place of Tournament Arena 2nd edition. This tarot active 2 seconds of damaging effect in 12 sqrs area.
This is your reward for the sixth place of Tournament Arena 2nd edition. This tarot active 2 seconds of armored effect in 12 sqrs area.
This is your reward for the seventh place of Tournament Arena 2nd edition. This tarot does healing effect in 12 sqrs area.
This is your reward for the fifth place of Tournament Arena 2nd edition. This tarot active 2 seconds of speedy effect in 12 sqrs area.
This is your reward for the ninth place of Tournament Arena 2nd edition. This tarot removes negative conditions in 12 sqrs area.
This is your reward for the forth place of Tournament Arena 2nd edition. This tarot active 2 seconds of invisibility effect in 12 sqrs area.
This is your reward for the eighth place of Tournament Arena 2nd edition. This tarot boosts party life and mana in 12 sqrs area.
This key can open Tournament Arena, created by Devwarlt.
A universally powerful staff embodied with the souls of dead heroes, originally intended to have destroyed the cosmics.
A sword forged straight from the depths of the underworld.
A feather-light sword with a swift and hungry blade that is never satisfied with just one kill.
A backpack to hold more space in your inventory.
I hope you brought him a present...
The entire chocolate cake from Oryx's Party. He was going to eat that later!
The entire cake from Oryx's Party. You're so greedy!
A slice of cake from Oryx's Party.
A dagger that uses the holy power of kyle to summon mallards
A staff made from the wood of the Elder Tree, embued with the essence of nature.

Object.id: Proph's Bow of the Frozen Winds
Object.Description: A bow of eternal ice that summons forth icy shards carried across the Frozen Winds.
